question: Will a nuclear weapon detonate in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if a nuclear weapon is detonated anywhere in the world between July 1, 2024 and December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET (inclusive). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of this market's resolution, any detonation of a nuclear weapon anywhere on the planet Earth will be sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution. This includes offensive usages, nuclear tests, and accidental detonations. 

Use/launch of a nuclear weapon that fails to detonate, a fake weapon that never detonates, or a dirty bomb that distributes radioactive material by means of a conventional explosion are not sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution of this market. Only a successful nuclear detonation will result in a "Yes" resolution.

This market may resolve to "Yes" as soon as a nuclear detonation is confirmed by a preponderance of credible reporting.

For the purpose of this market's resolution, determination as to whether a detonation was nuclear will be made by a preponderance of credible reporting.

question: Barron Trump talks about $DJT by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Barron Trump mentions the $DJT token (address: HRw8mqK8N3ASKFKJGMJpy4FodwR3GKvCFKPDQNqUNuEP), or if new audio or video of Barron Trump mentioning the $DJT token is publicly released, between June 25, 2024, 12:00 PM ET, and July 5, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

A ‘mention’ includes the following:

-A verbal usage of $DJT, specifically in relation to cryptocurrency, crypto-related terms or memes, or any cryptocurrency in particular.
-Any usage of $DJT, or any $DJT terms or memes on his social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization/punctuation. This includes usages in written, image, audio, or video media.

The mention must be made within this market's timeframe for it to qualify toward a "Yes" resolution. If footage of Barron talking about $DJT from prior this market's timeframe surfaces during this market's timeframe, it will not count toward a "Yes" resolution.

The primary resolution source for this market will be public statements from Barron Trump, and/or publicly released recordings from within the market's time frame. However, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Barron Trump talks about $DJT by Friday?

question: Biden stumbles by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joe Biden is recorded stumbling or tripping in public between June 28, 1:00 PM ET and July 5, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

If no such footage is released by the end date, this market will resolve to "No."

Photographs or announcements will not be considered toward this market's resolution. Only recorded video of Joe Biden stumbling in public will be sufficient to trigger a "Yes" resolution. The video must be original and not manipulated or digitally altered to mislead the viewer. Edited videos, deepfakes, or any form of manipulated media will not be considered valid for the resolution of this market.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the video(s) in question, verified by a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Biden stumbles by Friday?

question: Will Nancy Pelosi call on Biden to drop out?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Nancy Pelosi publicly states that Joe Biden should drop out of the 2024 presidential race before 12:00 AM ET on the first day of the Democratic National Convention, currently scheduled for August 19, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

Statements that the Democratic party should nominate another candidate other than Joe Biden will also qualify for a “Yes” resolution.

Statements that are hedged or express ambiguity, such as “We need to consider our options for the nominee” will NOT qualify for a “Yes” resolution. 

If the DNC does not begin by August 31, and Pelosi has not called for Biden to leave the ticket, this market will resolve to "No."

The primary resolution source for this market will be official statements by Nancy Pelosi or her official representative(s); however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Who will call for Biden to drop out?

question: France vs. Belgium - Who will advance?
description:
This market refers to the 2024 UEFA European Football Championship match between France and Belgium scheduled for July 1, 12:00 PM ET.

If France advances to the quarter finals this market will resolve to "France".

If Belgium advances to the quarter finals this market will resolve to "Belgium".

events.title: France vs. Belgium - Who will advance?

question: Will France win?
description:
This market refers to the 2024 UEFA European Football Championship match between France and Belgium scheduled for July 1, 12:00 PM ET.

If France wins the match this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".
 
Note: This match refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time. Extra time and penalty shootouts will not be considered.

events.title: Euro 2024: France  vs. Belgium

question: Will Trump be president by September 1?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald J. Trump is President of the United States for any length of time between June 30 and September 1, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market may only resolve to "No" once its end date has passed and Trump has not been President of the United States for any length of time.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

description:

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the government of the United States, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Biden nominated before Democratic convention?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Joe Biden is nominated as the Democratic candidate for the 2024 U.S. Presidential Election through a virtual roll call before the start of the Democratic National Convention (DNC), currently scheduled for August 19, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the DNC, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: US bank failure before September?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if any US bank fails between June 30, 2024, 12:00 PM ET, and August 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET (according to FDIC's "Failed Bank List"). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

For this market to resolve to "Yes", the bank's closing date as listed by the FDIC must be within the listed date range. If there is a potential bank failure within this market's date range and FDIC "Failed Bank List" has not been updated yet, this market may remain open to allow for the list to be updated.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC), specifically the "Failed Bank List" available here: https://www.fdic.gov/resources/resolutions/bank-failures/failed-bank-list/ however other official statements from the FDIC and government entities will suffice.

question: Biden interview by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if any video or audio interview with President Joe Biden is publicly recorded and released between July 1, 2024, 2:30 PM ET, and July 5, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The interview must be available to the public in either video or audio format, not exclusively in print. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

For the purposes of this market, an interview is defined as a recorded conversation where President Joe Biden answers questions posed by an interviewer, which can include podcasts and television shows. Press conferences or media briefings held by the White House will not count as interviews for the purposes of this market.

The primary resolution source will be the released interview recording, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Biden interview by Friday?

question: Will $ETH reach 3.7k in July?
description:
This market will immediately resolve to "Yes" if any Binance 1 minute candle for Ethereum (ETHUSDT) between July 1, 2024, 00:00 and July 31, 2024, 23:59 in the ET timezone has a final "High" price of $3,700.00 or higher. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETHUSDT "High" prices available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT, with the chart settings on "1m" for one-minute candles selected on the top bar.

Please note that the outcome of this market depends solely on the price data from the Binance ETHUSDT trading pair. Prices from other exchanges, different trading pairs, or spot markets will not be considered for the resolution of this market.

events.title: What price will $ETH reach in July?

question: Will Conservative Party win between 0 and 24 seats in the next UK Election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Conservative Party controls less between 0 (inclusive) and 24 (inclusive) seats in the House of Commons as a result of the next UK General Election. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If voting in the next UK General Election does not occur by January 31, 2025, this market will resolve to "No".

This market's resolution will be based solely on the number of seats won by the Conservative Party, not any coalition of which it may be a part.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the UK Government, however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: # of Conservative seats after UK Election? (0-125)

question: Will another player win Wimbledon Men's?
description:
The market will resolve to “Yes” if any player other than Carlos Alcaraz, Jannik Sinner, Novak Djokovic, Alexander Zverev, Hubert Hurkacz, Daniil Medvedev, Alex De Minaur, Nick Kyrgios, Stevanos Tsitsipas, or Taylor Fritz wins the 2024 Wimbledon Championships Men's Singles tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

If no winner of the 2024 Wimbledon Championships Men's Singles tournament is declared by July 31, 2024, this market will resolve to "Yes".

The primary resolution source will be official information from Wimbledon (https://www.wimbledon.com/), however credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Wimbledon Champion

question: Will Biden say "Democracy" during his speech?
description:
Joe Biden is scheduled to make live remarks on July 1, 7:45 PM ET, on the Supreme Court's Immunity Ruling. This market refers to anything Biden says during this scheduled event, including any Q&A he might give after his prepared remarks. You can view the event here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vtc_n4Tqr8k. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Biden says "Democracy". Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No". 

If Biden does not give a speech on July 1, 2024 this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "Democracy" is part of the compound word which refers to a system of government in which citizens chose their leaders.

The resolution source is live video of the speech. In case of ambiguity, an official transcript and/or a consensus of credible reporting may also be considered.

events.title: What will Biden say during Immunity Speech today?
